synopsis.text: Most of the Aqours idol group from Uranohoshi Girls' High School have triumphed in the Love Live! contest, but as they prepare for their next chapter at a new school, obstacles arise. The first and second-year students find themselves in a neglected branch school, while their third-year counterparts vanish during a graduation trip. As the Aqours members confront their individual challenges, they begin to cherish their unity more than ever. Will they find their missing friends and prove their dedication to the new school, or will they succumb to the pressures of their newfound circumstances? Join the Aqours as they embark on a journey of self-discovery, friendship, and determination in Love Live! Sunshine!! The School Idol Movie: Over the Rainbow.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
